text:
@BBCNews @BBCPolitics 1.6 MILLION forced to use #foodbanks 
1.5 MILLION classed as 'vulnerable' to catching #COVID19
So far the @CONservatives have handed over £100 BILLION to businesses but can only give charities just over £10 PER PERSON to help our most vulnerable citizens.
F#cking disgraceful.
